secret_page.heading: Welcome to ${business_name}
secret_page.description: There's nothing to see here yet. But soon it will be an awesome home page.

sign_in_page.heading: Hey friend! Welcome back

account_locked.heading: Account locked
account_locked.description: You've entered an incorrect code too many times and your account has been locked for ${lockout_duration_minutes} minutes

password_setup.confirm_password_input_error_mismatch: Please make sure passwords are identical
